text: Priscilla Opoku-Kwarteng (16 February 1997 â€“ 8 February 2018), known by the stage name Ebony, was a Ghanaian dancehall/Afrobeats artist widely known for her hit songs "Poison" and "Kupe". She was discovered by Bullet, a member of Ruff n Smooth fame. She was born in Accra, Ghana. In April 2017, Reigns was arrested for exposing her breast while wearing a mini-skirt at a passport office in Accra as she attempted to travel to Tokyo for her concert. Reigns was killed in a car crash on 8 February 2018 while returning from Sunyani to Accra after a visit. She was one week shy from her 21st birthday. ==References== Category:1997 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Road accident deaths Category:Ghanaian musicians Category:Singers Category:People from Accra
title: Ebony Reigns
